channel.title: CVE Feed for Elcomplus -- SmartPTT SCADA Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elcomplus -- SmartPTT SCADA Server

item.title: CVE-2021-43938|2024-08-04T04:10:17.167Z -- elcomplus -- smartptt%20scada%20server
item.description: Elcomplus SmartPTT SCADA Server is vulnerable to an unauthenticated user can request various files from the server without any authentication or authorization.

item.title: CVE-2021-43937|2024-08-04T04:10:17.001Z -- elcomplus -- smartptt%20scada%20server
item.description: Elcomplus SmartPTT SCADA Server web application does not, or cannot, sufficiently verify whether a well-formed, valid, consistent request was intentionally provided by the user who submitted the request.
